nodes.text: Ezra's Quest (French: La quête d'Ezra) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episode "Legacy". Ezra's Quest was published by Hachette Jeunesse on October 19, 2016.

As the missions follow one another, Ezra keeps having weird dreams. Determined to discover their meaning, the young Rebel returns to Lothal. But the answers he finds there are worrying. What if his fight against the Empire was ultimately doomed?
